channel.title: Fedora Desktop Setup - David Vargas
channel.description: When you first download Fedora Workstation, it’s going to be a little hard to figure out how to make it usable. Especially if you’ve never tinkered with Linux before. Here is how to set up Fedora. Add badname user $ adduser --badname firstname.lastname $ sudo usermod -aG wheel username # uncomment this line in the visudo file $ sudo visudo %wheel ALL=(ALL) ALLDelete other user: $ userdel username DNF Config (for speed) DNF is one of the package managers that comes with Fedora.
